alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 10:23AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Nueces and southeastern San Patricio Counties through 1045 AM CDT... At 1022 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Annaville, or 8 miles north of Corpus Christi International Airport, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corpus Christi, Portland, Robstown, Sinton, Taft, Corpus Christi International Airport, Odem, Gregory, Del Mar College Windward Campus, Corpus Christi North Beach, Cole Park, Del Mar College Heritage Campus, Clarkwood, Annaville, Calallen, Downtown Corpus Christi, Edroy, Taft Southwest and Tuloso. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 1 and 22. US Highway 181 between mile markers 634 and 648. US Highway 77 between mile markers 648 and 658. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio
